org.eclipse.papyrus.infra.services.tracepoints

Class MarkerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.papyrus.infra.services.tracepoints.MarkerUtils

  • public class MarkerUtils
extends Object
    Utilities for Markers (TODO: some of these are generic marker services (move to infra core markers) and not specific to tracepoints).
    Author:
    ansgar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet resourceSet
      our own copy of resource set we do not use the Papyrus resourceSet, since every editor keeps his own copy of the resource set (which is probably quite bad) and thus no resourceSet would be available, if Papyrus is not open.
